page.title: 12QUERNMORE SPORTS 3
page.content: An important event is the Clougha Pike Amateur Fell Race which attracts over 100 runners. The adults have to race five and a half miles to the top of Clougha and back to the sports field while for the juniors the distance is three miles. In the evening the adults are given a chance to join in. The six a side football final takes place followed by races, pillowfights and the tug of war. People come from Cumbria to take part in the Cumberland and Westmorland wrestling and the Quoiting always has its followers. This is a very old tradition of Quernmore Sports. The competitor has to try and throw a metal ring over a feather and the winner is the person who gets the most quoits over the feather.
